```{r}
library(dbplyr)
library(tidyverse)


#1
code_clan_tweets <- read_csv("code_clan_tweets.csv")
view(code_clan_tweets)
```

```{r}
nrow(code_clan_tweets)
ncol(code_clan_tweets)
names(code_clan_tweets)
```
```{r}
tail(code_clan_tweets)
```


```{r}
#2
boxplot(code_clan_tweets$tweet_id)
```
```{r}
#Q3
code_clan_tweets_liked <- mutate(code_clan_tweets,is_quote = "FALSE")
code_clan_tweets_liked
view(code_clan_tweets_liked)
```
```{r}
#Q4
#group data
retweets_grouped <- group_by(code_clan_tweets_liked, source)
retweets_grouped
             
view(retweets_grouped)  
```

```{r}
#summarise /count data
summarise(retweets_grouped, count=n())
```
```{r}
platform_type <- mean(retweets_grouped$retweet_count) 
platform_type
```
```{r}
#Q5
media_stated <- select(code_clan_tweets_liked, media_type)
```
```{r}
media_stated
```

```{r}
media_likes <- media_stated %>%
    drop_na() 

media_likes
```
```{r}
view(media_likes) 

```


```{r}
#Q6
x <-nchar("@CodeClanScot has arrived in the Highlands! https://t.co/IJT6zbhEBT via @YouTube")

mean(x)
```
